title: [GAMEPLAY] Jhin q after patch 6.6
body: Hey, After rolling out patch 6.6, theres a really annoying bug on jhin and his q, it only bounces to something around 2 minions occasionally (the initial hit after casting + one bounce to another and disappears) It's really annoying for me as a jhin main

replies.body:
Hey IWillBePro! 

Thanks for reporting this! We're aware of this issue and are working to get a fix in ASAP.

Riot is aware of the bug and working on it~
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/jQYaup3c-gameplay-hn-jhin-q-bounce-only-twice?comment=0001
This usually happens if you are AA'ing the next minion it's going to bounce to also. I noticed this bug today, and it happened really frequently which was really annoying.
